outcome: Underground network activates Halden's code to dismantle oppressive systems and restore democratic governance.

events.description: The underground network decodes a hidden signal from Halden, prompting activation of his restorative protocols.
The underground activists gain public support by unveiling documents detailing the oppressive nature of BCI.
A counter-movement within the Directorate tries to regain control, labeling the activists as a national threat.
Debates erupt nationwide on the BCI's role and the potential shift towards democratic governance.
